name: Buddypress Jquery Activity Stream Widget
author: dunhakdis

sections.description:
Widgetize your BP activity streams!

Let your site viewers/users easily read the activity streams by adding a simple yet customizable widget that displays streams in an animated manner.

Users can:

  • Enter desired animation speed
  • Enter desired animation timeouts
  • User can select from two effects (Slide and Fade). Will be adding more soon!
  • Customize widget area height

Note: This plugin works with buddypress installed on your website.
sections.installation:
1. Upload this plugin to /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. In your wordpress administration, go to appearance>widgets>. Drag and drop the plugin in widgets area.

    Note: Your theme must be widget ready.
sections.faq:
Can I enter delays/timeouts?

Yes

Can I select what type of animation I liked?

No
